column3: Slowfix wants you to eliminate the golems that prowl Idyllshire.

Golem sentinels left by the Sharlayans are hampering Slowfix's plans for expanding Idyllshire, and the goblin asks that you eliminate them. As a native of Sharlayan, Y'shtola may know an easy way to deal with the creatures.

Y'shtola shares with you the coded command required to unmake the golems. With the chat mode in \x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03Say\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to inform each golem that you want to play a game called \xe2\x80\x9cNoughts and Crosses.\xe2\x80\x9d
You have unmade all the golems in your assigned area. Return to Slowfix with the good tidings.
You report the completion of your task to Slowfix. The goblin is pleased to hear that the golems will no longer impede the expansion effort.
With the chat mode in \x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03Say\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03, enter \xe2\x80\x9cNoughts and Crosses\xe2\x80\x9d to unmake golems.
Pshkohhh... So uplanders agree to help? Good! Here is what Slowfix wants uplanders to do.
Many golems prowl Idyllshire, get in the way of expansion plans. Slowfix wants uplanders to eliminate golems.
Uplanders are Sharlayan, yes? Sharlayans should know best way to deal with creatures.
Slowfix wants uplanders to eliminate golems. Uplanders are Sharlayan, yes? Sharlayans should know best way to deal with creatures.
From the goblins' perspective, such a well-appointed city is certainly an attractive proposition.
I suppose it's only to be expected that others would come and occupy Sharlayan. Nonetheless, it feels akin to having strangers take over your home in your absence.
Sentinel golems? I daresay Y'shtola will know how to deal with them.
So we are to eliminate the golems. That should be a simple enough affair.

The automata were employed as sentinels, and by design can be unmade with a coded command. At the time of the exodus, it was \xe2\x80\x9cNoughts and Crosses,\xe2\x80\x9d and I see no reason why it should not still work.
Let us divide the task between the three of us, the quicker to be finished with it.

With the chat mode in \x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03Say\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter the coded command \xe2\x80\x9cNoughts and Crosses\xe2\x80\x9d to unmake a golem.
Use the coded command \xe2\x80\x9cNoughts and Crosses\xe2\x80\x9d to unmake the golems. If all goes well, we can accomplish the task without recourse to violence.
I shall see to the golems beyond this point. The area yonder, I leave in your capable hands.

With the chat mode in \x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03Say\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter the password \xe2\x80\x9cNoughts and Crosses\xe2\x80\x9d to unmake a golem.
With a shudder, the golem crumbles to pieces.
Now we can resume work to expand settlement!
I'm pleased to report that my golems obediently crumbled at my command.
Of all the luck, one of my golems was not receptive to the password, and tried to pummel me bloody. Thankfully, I managed to dance clear of its fists and strike it down.
